headline: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (VRTX): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q1 Earnings?
summary: Vertex Pharmaceuticals trades at $469.50 and has moved in lockstep with the market. Its shares have returned 6.5% over the last six months while the S&P 500 has gained 5.4%.
